docs.text: in the year 2029 , captain leo davidson ( mark wahlberg , " boogie nights " ) is training 'his' chimp pericles to pilot a pod from the usaf oberon space station .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: when an electromagnetic storm is encountered and pericles' pod is lost , davidson sets out unauthorized and lands thousands of years in the future on the " planet of the apes . "
docs.label: negative

docs.text: maybe if 20th century fox had set the proverbial 100 chimps in front of typewriters they would have gotten a better results than this adaptation of the pierre boulle novel by william broyles jr . ( " cast away " ) , and lawrence konner & mark d . rosenthal ( " mighty joe young " ) .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: director tim burton's unique look and style are nowhere to be found in this silly , pointless remake .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: davidson no sooner lands than he finds himself being swarmed by savages running in terror , whom he wisely joins .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: however , he's rounded up with the lot of them by the apes which rule this plant and handed over to slave trader limbo ( paul giamatti , " duets " ) .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: ari ( helena bonham carter , " fight club " ) , daughter of the illustrious senator sandar ( david warner , " titanic " ) and simian bleeding heart , believes humans should live with apes on equal standing , an unpopular notion .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: she takes a liking to leo , who she deems 'unusual . '
docs.label: negative

docs.text: general thade ( tim roth , " lucky numbers " ) is of the opposite opinion , wishing for declaration of martial law that will allow him to annihilate the race .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: he's sweet on ari .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: it's relatively easy to see where this 'new' story is going from the onset , yet its ultimate revelation has gaping logic holes .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: the much ballyhooed 'surprise' ending is a nonsensical let down .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: an attempt at a love triangle , conveyed by ari and the human daena ( estella warren , " driven " ) giving each other 'back off' looks over leo , fails because he never develops a relationship with either of them .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: the lone sex scene is some hilarious foreplay between elder orangutan senator nado ( glenn shadix ) and his trophy wife nova ( burton's squeeze , lisa marie ) .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: guffaws will also likely greet charlton heston's cameo as thade's father , the one ape harboring a firearm ( ! ) who sputters some very familiar lines before dying .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: the only real success of the 2001 " planet of the apes " is rick baker's makeup , and even that's an iffy affair .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: no attempt was made to change the human whiteness of the actors' eyes , a real distraction amidst some otherwise impressive work .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: roth , warner and michael clarke duncan ( as thade's right hand man attar ) are given the most impressive makeovers .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: giamatti looks more like a skull than an ape and the female apes are too humanized to be given sexual appeal .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: tim roth delivers the most impressive acting job by getting the body language right - his nasty chimpanzee character leaps about , most spectacularly when mounting his steed , but even's he's undone by some obvious wire work .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: bonham carter delivers a goodly range of emotion from behind a stiff prosthetic , but is undone in turn by the silliness of the writing .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: most of the film has a set bound look which no amount of mist can cover .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: the ape's city resembles a dank complex of tree houses .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: the apes' military costumes ( colleen atwood , " sleepy hollow " ) as well as their field tents are reminiscent of eiko ishioka's work on coppola's " dracula . "
docs.label: negative

docs.text: that oriental flavor is also found in danny elfman's tribal , percussive score .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: " planet of the apes " was the last blockbuster hope for the summer of 2001 , a dismal movie season that's going to the dogs .
docs.label: negative
